channel.title: Test & Purchase on Connector 365 Online Help
channel.description: Recent content in Test & Purchase on Connector 365 Online Help

item.title: AppSource
item.description: Test & purchase AppSource The app is available on Microsoft AppSource. The app has a testing period of 30 days, from first installation. Within this period you can use the app in its entirety. If you like the app you order licenses using our order form. The licensing is based on the user count, regarding all users with either a Team Member or Essentials license will be counted. order now

item.title: OnPrem
item.description: Test & Purchase OnPrem Test You have the possibility to test our Connector 365 Report Layout App without obligation or to purchase it directly. For this we need some information from you. To the form The app has a testing period of 30 days, from first installation. Within this period you can use the app in its entirety. If you like the app you order licenses using our order form.
